entry.title: My first post
entry.content:
I didn't ask for a completely reasonable excuse! I asked you to get busy! Stop it, stop it. It's fine. I will 'destroy' you! You, a bobsleder!? That I'd like to see! Kids have names?

Yes. You gave me a dollar and some candy. One hundred dollars. Oh right. I forgot about the battle. We can't compete with Mom! Her company is big and evil! Ours is small and neutral! Eeeee! Now say "nuclear wessels"!

Continue reading...
